meanings.definition: A small colorless organelle in the cytoplasm of plant cells, involved in the synthesis and storage of food.
meanings.sent1: The proplastids in the plant cells help store food for the plant.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study proplastids to understand how plants make and keep their food.
meanings.sent3: The proplastids in the plant cells were having a party, storing all the delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The proplastids worked like tiny food safes, keeping the plant nourished.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the proplastids looked like tiny storage containers filled with plant food.

meanings.definition: A precursor to plastids, found in the cells of plants.
meanings.sent1: Before becoming plastids, proplastids are present in plant cells.
meanings.sent2: The growth of plastids starts with the development of proplastids.
meanings.sent3: The proplastids were like little plant babies waiting to grow up into plastids.
meanings.sent4: In the plant cells, proplastids were the pioneers of plastid formation.
meanings.sent5: Proplastids are like the seeds from which plastids sprout and flourish in plant cells.
